title: Quadcopter Person Surveillance
detail: A Quadcopter that silently tracks a given person.
extended_details: We will use smartphone sensors and digital signal processing to track a person in realtime from a quadcopter camera.  Could detect distress and alert a persons smartphone or call 911 if needed.  Use case for someone walking home late at night or maybe a soldier in battle.
